Items.Title: Oversight - NYPD Officer Performance Indicators
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S6760, legislation to allow access to sealed and protected records to civilian law enforcement oversight entities conducting investigations and disciplinary proceedings for misconduct by police and peace officers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allow access to sealed and protected records to civilian law enforcement oversight entities conducting investigations and disciplinary proceedings for misconduct by police and peace officers. (S.6760)

Items.Title: Oversight - NYPD Officer Performance Indicators
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S6760, legislation to allow access to sealed and protected records to civilian law enforcement oversight entities conducting investigations and disciplinary proceedings for misconduct by police and peace officers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allow access to sealed and protected records to civilian law enforcement oversight entities conducting investigations and disciplinary proceedings for misconduct by police and peace officers. (S.6760)
